**User Story**
Describe the user-facing need using the following structure:

> As a **[type of user]**, I want **[a capability]**, so that **[a concrete benefit]**.

Example:
> As an operator of a remote sensor node, I want to update controller configuration files remotely, so that devices can be reconfigured without physical access.

**Contribution Intent**
Please indicate whether you would like to work on this feature yourself.

- [ ] I would like to implement this feature and submit a pull request.
- [ ] I am proposing the idea only and cannot contribute implementation at this time.

**Additional context**
- Add any other context or mockup about the feature request here.
